snippet: Speaking on camera for the first time since she survived an assassination attempt by the Pakistani Taliban last year, the young activist Malala Yousafzai began with the words, "Today you can see that I'm alive."
abstract: Speaking on camera for the first time since she survived an assassination attempt by the Pakistani Taliban last year, the young activist Malala Yousafzai began with the words, "Today you can see that I'm alive."

headline.main: Malala Yousafzai, Pakistani Girl Shot by Taliban Militants, Speaks in New Videos
headline.print_headline: Girl Shot by Taliban Vows to Continue Activism
